CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Geothermal?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Geothermal is arc {Oil}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Geothermal?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Geothermal is arc {Coal}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Coal to Natural Gas in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Geothermal to Biomass in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Natural Gas and Coal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Natural Gas and Coal is {232}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Geothermal and Natural Gas in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Geothermal and Natural Gas is {184}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Oil?
SC.A: The total flow output from Oil is {269}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Coal?
SC.A: The total flow input by Coal is {232}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 195? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {269} from {Oil} to {Biomass}, a flow of {232} from {Natural Gas} to {Coal}, a flow of {199} from {Natural Gas} to {Geothermal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 170? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {127} from {Biomass} to {Oil}, a flow of {33} from {Natural Gas} to {Biomass}, a flow of {156} from {Biomass} to {Natural Gas}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 186 and 191? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {189} from {Coal} to {Natural Gas}, a flow of {191} from {Geothermal} to {Biomass}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Geothermal to Biomass or from Geothermal to Natural Gas?
NC.A: The flow from {Geothermal} to {Biomass} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Biomass to Geothermal, from Natural Gas to Coal, or from Oil to Biomass?
NC.A: The flow from {Oil} to {Biomass} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Oil}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Coal} and {Natural Gas}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Biomass, Arc Oil, Arc Geothermal, Arc Natural Gas, Arc Coal}.
